description: This notification is generated whenever compute node state changes.

event.Summary: Compute node $v2 state changed to $v4. Compute cluster: $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAECNStateChange JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAECNId s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAECNName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAECCName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAECNState i 0 JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAECNLastStateChange s EXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLE

description: Name of the Compute Cluster, to which this Compute Node belongs.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAECCName

description: State of Compute Node as seen by the VE platform Manager.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAECNState

description: The date and time when last state change was observed for this
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAECNLastStateChange

description: This notification whenever the virutal machine status changes.

event.Summary: Status of virtual machine $v2 on node $v3 is $v5

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAEVMStateChange JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAEVMId s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAEVMName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAEVMCNId s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAEVMUuid s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAEVMStatus i 0

description: An unique identifier for this virtual machine instance. This
identifier is not retained across restart of the subsytem.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAEVMId

description: Name of the virtual machine instance.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAEVMName

description: Id of the compute node on which the virtual machine runs.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAEVMCNId

description: Status of the virtual machine instance.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JVAE-INFRA-MIB::jnxJVAEVMStatus
